info.name: Weather Consumer API Template
info.description:
## Notes:

For AddMetric Endpoint ([http://localhost:8080/v1/](http://localhost:8080/metrics)[metrics](http://localhost:8080/metrics)):

- sensorID should not be null
    
- timestamp should be in **ISO 8601 UTC** format (ending in `Z`)
    

For Query **In-Memory Aggregation** Endpoint ([http://localhost:8080/v1/metrics/query](http://localhost:8080/metrics/query))

For Query **Database-Level Aggregation** Endpoint ([http://localhost:8080/v1/metrics/query](http://localhost:8080/metrics/query))

- `sensorIds`: `[]` means **all sensors**.
    
- `startDate` and `endDate` must be in **ISO 8601 UTC** format (ending in `Z`).
    
- Supported metrics: `"temperature"` and `"humidity"` (or both).
    
- Supported statistics: `"avg"`, `"min"`, `"max"`, `"sum"`. Notes:
    
    - `sensorIds`: `[]` means **all sensors**.
        
    - `startDate` and `endDate` must be in **ISO 8601 UTC** format (ending in `Z`).
        
    - Supported metrics: `"temperature"` and `"humidity"` (or both).
        
    - Supported statistics: `"avg"`, `"min"`, `"max"`, `"sum"`.
        

| Endpoint | Action |
| --- | --- |
| `POST /v1/metrics` | Add new metric |
| `POST /v1/metrics/query` | Query in-memory aggregated data |
| `POST /v1/metrics/query-db` | Query DB aggregated data |

item.name: Add Metric Endpoint
item.description:
`POST /v1/metrics`Add new metric

For AddMetric Endpoint ([http://localhost:8080/v1/](http://localhost:8080/metrics)[metrics](http://localhost:8080/metrics)):

- sensorID should not be null
    
- humidity ( 0 to 100)
    
- temperature (0 to 100)
    
- timestamp should be in **ISO 8601 UTC** format (ending in `Z`)
    

  
Sample json  
`   { "sensorId": "sensorkeep",`

`"temperature": 35.5,`

`"humidity": 101,`

`"timestamp": "2025-04-04T14:30:00Z"}`
